2. Fan Site Disclaimer

The Hobbinomicon is an independent fan site dedicated to tabletop gaming, miniature painting, and hobby content. This Site is NOT affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by Games Workshop, Warhammer, Citadel, or any other gaming company, manufacturer, or trademark holder mentioned on this Site.

All trademarks, service marks, trade names, product names, and logos appearing on this Site are the property of their respective owners. Any use of such trademarks is purely for descriptive and editorial purposes and does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by the trademark holders.

3. Use License

Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on The Hobbinomicon for personal, non-commercial viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

  • Modify or copy the materials

  • Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software on the Site

This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by The Hobbinomicon at any time.

4. User Content and Comments

By submitting content, comments, or messages through our contact form or any other means, you grant The Hobbinomicon a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, and worldwide license to use, reproduce, modify, and display such content.

You agree not to post content that:

  • Is unlawful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, or invasive of privacy
  • Infringes any patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright, or other proprietary rights
  • Contains software viruses or any other malicious code
  • Is spam or unsolicited advertising

5. External Links

The Hobbinomicon may contain links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by us. We do not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites. The inclusion of any links does not imply endorsement by The Hobbinomicon.

6. Disclaimer of Warranties

The materials on The Hobbinomicon are provided on an "as is" basis. The Hobbinomicon makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

Further, The Hobbinomicon does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this Site.

7. Limitations of Liability

In no event shall The Hobbinomicon or its contributors be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on The Hobbinomicon, even if The Hobbinomicon or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

8. Intellectual Property

All original content on The Hobbinomicon, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and video content created by the site owner, is the property of The Hobbinomicon and is protected by copyright laws.

All third-party trademarks, product names, company names, and logos mentioned on this Site are the property of their respective owners and are used here for identification and reference purposes only. Their use does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by the trademark holders.

9. Copyright Infringement

If you believe that any content on The Hobbinomicon infringes your copyright, please contact us at matt@hobbinomicon.com with the following information:

  • Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed

10. Modifications to Terms

The Hobbinomicon may revise these Terms of Service at any time without notice. By using this Site, you are agreeing to be bound by the then-current version of these Terms of Service.
